content: this pattern is named after my pomchi coco who loved christmas and inspired this design to find more information about this pattern https //thek4project com/blogs/free-patterns-tutorials/coco-s-crochet-snowflake-a-quick-15-minute-ornament-pattern 1 ✨ materials medium worsted weight yarn #4 crochet hook size 6/7 or smaller scissors and tapestry needle skill level beginner ⏱️ time about 15 minutes want to support the k4 project you can purchase the pdf pattern https //thek4project com/products/cocos-snowflake-crochet-ornament when you purchase a pattern a portion of proceeds helps support animal welfare ❤️ **follow me ** * subscribe k4 project youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucanhpkfykhnqx4u4vupvqaq * website thek4project etsy com https //thek4project etsy com * instagram @thek4project https //www instagram com/thek4project * tiktok @thek4project https //www tiktok com/thek4project * pinterest @thek4project https //www pinterest com/thek4project/ * ravelry knitty kitty patterns https //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/knitty-kitty **copyright notice ** this pattern is © 2025 thek4project for personal use only you may not translate distribute copy alter or sell this pattern you may sell finished items made with this pattern if you credit the k4 project as the designer and link to my website no wholesale please feel free to leave any questions or comments below and don t forget to share your project if you make these ornaments **happy crocheting and happy holidays ** 1 https //thek4project com/blogs/free-patterns-tutorials/coco-s-crochet-snowflake-a-quick-15-minute-ornament-pattern
